name: astrosteveo-plugins
description: A collection of Claude plugins developed by astrosteveo to enhance productivity and project management.

plugins.name: ace-workflows
plugins.description: ACE-FCA workflow plugin implementing Research → Plan → Implement cycles with intentional context compaction and human leverage points.

plugins.name: superharness
plugins.description: Command-driven development workflow merging ace-workflows and harness. Features TDD enforcement, research-first planning, systematic debugging, and context handoffs with .harness/ directory structure.
